chapter.title: JSON Web Signature and Encryption (JOSE-JWT)
chapter.para: JSON Web Signature and Encryption (JOSE JWT) is a new specification that can be used to encode content as a string and either digitally sign or encrypt it. I won't go over the spec here Do a Google search on it if you're interested
